column5: Where are the reports from the opener? You would think that someone caught something, and would be a little excited about it. Well maybe some want to keep it a secret. I'll be there  from Mon - Thurs. I 'm going with Sandybay and hope to get a few pickeral, and A few perch as well. I've got a fellow back home here who wants me to bring him a good feed of herring as well. I'll report on Friday since it will be a long ride back on Thurs. night. Good luck to all, and may all of you come home with a good feed of fish.
Good luck!  If we don't hear from you, we'll assume you did SO well that you're keeping it a secret too??
